install.name: Fmc Likebox
install.author: Jonathan Karipios
install.description: Fmc Facebook LikeBox a facebook fanpage/profile/group box to display your fans on your joomla Site!

param.name: link_to_page
param.label: FB Page Link
param.description: Here input the link of the facebook page or other you want to show in the likebox ex. http://www.facebook.com/joomla

param.name: include_stream
param.label: Include Stream
param.description: Include or not the stream of latest posts from your Facebook Page.

param.name: boxcolor
param.label: Color
param.description: Color chooser from facebook api dark or light

param.name: fbheader
param.label: FanBox Header
param.description: Show Header Image for find us of Like box if fans or stream is enabled

param.name: fbborder
param.label: Box Border Color
param.description: Put the border color in hex ex 000000 or ffffff without the #

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix for the CSS class of the module.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Selection of cache of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: Time before the module is recached
